titleStmt.title: A speech by the Marquesse of Argile to the Honourable Lords and Commons in Parliament. 25. June 1646. With a paper concerning their full consent to the propositions to be presently sent to His Majesty for a safe and well grounded peace. Die Veneris 26. Junii 1646. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that the Marquesse of Argiles speech, with the paper concerning the propositions, be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Marquis of, 1598-1661.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: Includes "A paper delivered in from the Commissioners of Scotland, concerning the propositions", dated at end: Iune 25. 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Bayley.
